title: Finshots College Weekly - Disney's Battle & Kerela's Complaints
content:
In this week's newsletter, we talk about Disney's billion-dollar boardroom battle, Kerala's financial crisis, Rule of 72 and more.

If you'd like to receive our 3-min daily newsletter that breaks down the world of business & finance in plain English - click here.

Also, a quick side note. If you're someone who has great communication skills and are looking to join a dynamic team, Ditto is recruiting new Insurance Advisors. You don't even have to know much about Insurance â€” We will train you from scratch and you can enjoy working remotely with a great team. Click here to apply.
